title: Getting Started
description: Welcome to the platform! This guide will help you get up and running.

content:
# Welcome to the Platform

We're excited to have you here! This guide will walk you through the basics of using our platform.

## First Steps

After logging in, you'll see the main dashboard. Here's what you can do:

1. **Explore the Sidebar** - The left sidebar contains all main navigation items
2. **Check Your Profile** - Click your avatar in the top right to access settings
3. **Create Your First Spike** - Start exploring ideas with our Spike feature

## Key Features

### Spikes

Spikes are time-boxed explorations or experiments. Use them to:

- Test new ideas
- Research solutions
- Prototype concepts

### Settings

Access system settings from the user menu to customize:

- Profile information
- Notification preferences
- Display settings

## Need Help?

If you get stuck, you can:

- Browse our FAQ section
- Check the troubleshooting guides
- Contact support

> **Tip:** Use the search bar at the top of this Help section to quickly find answers!
